channel.title: TidyTuesday on E&C Data Science Blog
channel.description: Recent content in TidyTuesday on E&C Data Science Blog

item.title: Do you want to play a game?
item.description: For our first joint blog post we decided to look at this week’s #TidyTuesday dataset. Tidy Tuesday is a weekly data project aimed at the R for Data Science community. Every week a raw dataset is posted so that users can apply their R skills, get feedbak, explore other’s work, and connect with the greater #RStats community. This week’s data is about Board Games! The data comes from the Board Game Geek database.
